channel.title: ARTIK, ARTIK-520, IoT, openHAB on David G. Simmons
channel.description: Recent content in ARTIK, ARTIK-520, IoT, openHAB on David G. Simmons

item.title: OpenHAB Server on ARTIK-520
item.description: As I said earlier, when you have a hammer … So I decided to set up Yet Another IoT Gateway. This time I took a look at OpenHAB the “vendor and technology agnostic open source automation software for your home.” Why not, right? I’ve already set up a Droplit.io edge server, and an Eclipse Kura server, so why not give one more a try right? Right. So let’s dive in.
